summary: This document appears to be a Yahoo! account management record for an account named 'jeeproject' associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It shows account creation details, alternate email addresses, and registration information linking the account to Epstein in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the full name associated with the Yahoo! account 'jeeproject', with address information in New York, NY.

events.title: Yahoo! account creation
events.description: A Yahoo! account under the name 'jeeproject' was created, associated with Jeffrey Epstein and an alternate email address jeevacation@gmail.com.

keyFacts: A Yahoo! account named 'jeeproject' was created on April 2, 2001, and is linked to Jeffrey Epstein.
The account registration lists Jeffrey Epstein's location as New York, NY, with a zip code of 10022.
An alternate communication channel for the account is the email address jeevacation@gmail.com.
